snippet: Publishers and writers are jockeying for position as the old rules are falling away. In a dispute that underlines that conflict, the writer Kiana Davenport was dropped by her publisher for consorting with Amazon. The quarrel now has an unlikely...
abstract: Publishers and writers are jockeying for position as the old rules are falling away. In a dispute that underlines that conflict, the writer Kiana Davenport was dropped by her publisher for consorting with Amazon. The quarrel now has an unlikely resolution.

headline.main: After Dispute, Novelist Gets Amazon Deal
